Topic.Title: i saw a bird - My first game

Posts.EditableText:
[size=125:5tr1qfe3][b:5tr1qfe3][url=http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/awttambzleur1hovfkqe4w/i-saw-a-bird:5tr1qfe3]i saw a bird - a small tale of friendship[/url:5tr1qfe3][/b:5tr1qfe3][/size:5tr1qfe3]

I decided to post this randomly just to let the world know I have created my first game, mostly for testing the Squiffy engine. It's really short, and I don't know whether it could be considered a "game" per se as there is barely any interactivity, but maybe someone will like it...
Posts.HTML:
i saw a bird - a small tale of friendship

I decided to post this randomly just to let the world know I have created my first game, mostly for testing the Squiffy engine. It's really short, and I don't know whether it could be considered a "game" per se as there is barely any interactivity, but maybe someone will like it...
